es.title: Contenido resumido
es.prompt: Summarize the following text into 100 words, making it easy to read and comprehend. The summary should be concise, clear, and capture the main points of the text. Avoid using complex sentence structures or technical jargon. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Spanish. Please begin by editing the following text:
es.description: Resuma el siguiente texto en 100 palabras de forma que sea fácil de leer y comprender. Evita estructuras oracionales complejas o términos técnicos.
